Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron roard and transformed into robot mode. His flame sword in his 
right hand he took a fighting stance. "There can be only one!" His wings 
spread and he shot into the air his left hand blasting a lazer shot at 
Megatron.

--part1_1aa.77e8f82.2a9da14c_boundary
